summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6036 for the improvement of 25th Avenue South from Hudson Street to Ferdinand Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81948, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
